blocks.name: Banner Promo CTA
blocks.title: Banner Promo CTA
blocks.description: A promotional banner with message, discount text, and arrow link CTA. Features a full-width primary background with centered content including a bold message, discount text, and an underlined link with arrow icon. Ideal for seasonal sales, promotional announcements, and limited-time offers.

separator.description: Separator element between message and discount

actions.description: Array of action configurations for CTA links/buttons

iconAfter.description: Icon to display after the label

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the action

asButton.description: Render as a button element instead of an anchor/link

actionsSlot.description: Custom slot for rendering actions (overrides actions array)

background.description: Background style variant for the section

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the banner container

containerClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the inner container

contentClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the content wrapper

messageClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the message

separatorClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the separator

discountClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the discount

actionsClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the actions container

blocks.name: Banner Countdown Sale
blocks.title: Banner Countdown Sale
blocks.description: A flash sale banner with live countdown timer showing hours:minutes:seconds. Features a red urgency background with a live countdown timer that automatically updates every second. The timer displays time remaining until the sale ends. Ideal for flash sales, time-limited promotions, and urgency-driven marketing campaigns.

timerSlot.description: Custom slot for rendering the timer (overrides default timer)

renderTimer.description: Custom render function for the timer

background.description: Background style variant for the section

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the banner container

containerClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the inner container

contentClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the content wrapper

messageClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the message

descriptionClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the description

timerClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the timer wrapper

timeUnitClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for each time unit box

separatorClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the separator

blocks.name: Banner Delivery Countdown
blocks.title: Banner Delivery Countdown
blocks.description: A delivery deadline banner with countdown timer and gift icon. Features an amber attention-grabbing background with a gift icon and live countdown timer. Shows time remaining to place an order for guaranteed delivery by a specific date. Ideal for holiday shipping deadlines, delivery guarantees, and order cutoff times.

icon.description: Icon to display (ReactNode for full flexibility)

iconName.description: Icon name for DynamicIcon (used if icon prop is not provided)

middleText.description: Text between timer and delivery date

deliveryDateClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the delivery date

blocks.name: Banner Announcement Dismissible
blocks.title: Banner Announcement Dismissible
blocks.description: A top announcement banner with icon, message, CTA button, and dismiss button. Features a clean background with border-bottom styling, containing an icon, announcement text, action button, and dismissible X button. The banner can be closed by the user and triggers an optional callback. Ideal for product launches, feature announcements, and important updates.

blocks.name: Banner Privacy Notice
blocks.title: Banner Privacy Notice
blocks.description: A bottom-positioned privacy policy update notice with shield icon, title, description, and review link. Features a fixed bottom position with border-top styling. Includes a dismiss button to close the banner. Ideal for privacy policy updates, legal notices, and compliance notifications.

blocks.name: Banner Survey Incentive
blocks.title: Banner Survey Incentive
blocks.description: A survey invitation banner with shopping bag icon and incentive offer. Features a clean background with border-bottom styling, containing a shopping bag icon, message with incentive offer, action button, and dismiss button. The layout is responsive with the icon hidden on mobile. Ideal for customer feedback collection, survey invitations, and engagement campaigns with discount incentives.

blocks.name: Banner Social Follow
blocks.title: Banner Social Follow
blocks.description: A gradient background banner encouraging social media follows. Features a vibrant pink-to-rose gradient background with white text, users icon, follow CTA button, and dismiss button. The layout is centered with responsive text alignment. Ideal for social media promotion, community building, and engagement campaigns.

blocks.name: Banner Event Promo
blocks.title: Banner Event Promo
blocks.description: An event promotion banner with primary background and registration CTA. Features a primary background with event name (bold), dot separator, event details, and a ghost-styled register button with arrow icon. The layout is responsive with content wrapping on smaller screens. Ideal for conference announcements, webinar promotions, and event registrations.

separator.description: Separator element between event name and details

blocks.name: Banner Floating Offer
blocks.title: Banner Floating Offer
blocks.description: A floating bottom banner with rounded corners and offer CTA. Features a fixed bottom position with primary background, rounded container on larger screens, offer text with bold title, dot separator, description, and a secondary-styled CTA button with arrow icon. The banner floats above content and can optionally be dismissed. Ideal for limited-time offers, conversion prompts, and persistent CTAs.

separator.description: Separator element between title and description

actions.description: Array of action configurations for CTA buttons

iconAfter.description: Icon to display after the label
